skill.name: Surging Life Force
skill.value: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by 36/43% for a limited time.

ability.name: God of the Harvest (Lv. 65)
ability.value: Sharply (25%) increases the number of soulstones received from battle.

ability.name: Power of Life (Lv. 78)
ability.value: Restores HP to Divina team members at the start of each wave.
